name: 6105: One Day in the Marine Corps
name_original: 6105: One Day in the Marine Corps
description:
A short, replayable simulation of an average Marine's day. Ready? Perfect. Sign here and here.

Features:

  • Clean your rifle for 2 hours!
  • Hurry up and wait!!!
  • Get blasted by your leaders for minor mistakes!!!!!

6105: One Day in the Marine Corps. No actual names are used. Most of the events mentioned actually happened to me. Not an official Marine Corps game. Written in two weeks. Semper.
